explicit.modelviews

Class DTMCView

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.modelviews.ModelView
      • explicit.modelviews.DTMCView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DTMC, Model, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DTMCAlteredDistributions

    public abstract class DTMCView
extends ModelView
implements DTMC, java.lang.Cloneable
    Base class for a DTMC view, i.e., a virtual DTMC that is obtained by mapping from some other model on-the-fly.
    The main job of sub-classes is to provide an appropriate getTransitionsIterator() method. Several other methods, providing meta-data on the model have to be provided as well. For examples, see the sub-classes contained in this package.

      • exportTransitionsToDotFile

        public void exportTransitionsToDotFile(int i,
                                       PrismLog out,
                                       java.lang.Iterable<Decorator> decorators)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Export the transitions from state i in Dot format to out, decorating using the given decorators.
        The default implementation throws an UnsupportedOperationException, so this method should be overloaded.
        Specified by:
        exportTransitionsToDotFile in interface Model
        Parameters:
        i - State index
        out - PrismLog for output
        decorators - the decorators (may be null)
        See Also:
